text: Kare wa itta. `Anata gataga, sake gatai shōgai ni torikakoma reta baai no soto kanarazu kare o tsurete modoru to, arrā ni kakete yakusoku shinai kagiri, watashi wa kare o anata gata to issho ni kesshite yaranaidearou.' Kōshite kare-ra ga kare ni genshuku ni chikatta toki, kare wa itta. `Arrā wa, watashi-tachi no itta koto no kanshi-sha de ara reru
